content.en: Inverter optimization: Algorithms play a crucial role in optimizing the performance of multilevel inverters. They are used to generate PWM signals, implement space vector PWM, develop novel modulation algorithms, minimize total harmonic distortion, simplify switching analysis, and reduce computational burden. These algorithms enable faster and more efficient operation of multilevel inverters, resulting in improved power conversion and reduced switching losses.
content.da: Inverteroptimering: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i optimeringen af multilevel inverters ydeevne. De bruges til at generere PWM-signaler, implementere rumvektor PWM, udvikle nye modulationsalgoritmer, minimere total harmonisk forvrængning, forenkle switchanalyser og reducere beregningsbyrden. Disse algoritmer muliggør hurtigere og mere effektiv drift af multilevel inverters, hvilket resulterer i forbedret strømkonvertering og reducerede switchtab.
